oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Real photo postcard of Pvt. Johnny S. Pittman on horseback
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Pvt. Johnny (Johnnie) S. Pittman of Crockett County, Tennessee served in Btry. C, 318th FA, 81st Div. In this real photo postcard, he posed in field artillery uniform, hat in hand, upon a horse. Two other soldiers on horseback are in the background. Pittman returned home and lived a long life as a farmer. He died in 1993 at age 98, the last surviving World War I veteran in Crockett County. [See also GWjack012-017.]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Pittman, Johnny S.
World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
